sentence: What would jesus actually do? probably ban nail guns
explanation: Nail refers to a small metal spike used for fastening things together. It can also refer to a human fingernail or the act of succeeding.

sentence: What does a chemist say when hes pouring water into an acid? drop the base.
explanation: Base refers to a compound that accepts protons. It can also refer to the foundation or bottom support of something.

sentence: Why did the hipster burn his fingers? because he changed the light bulb before it was cool
explanation: Cool can refer to a lower temperature. It can also refer to something thats trendy or fashionable.
first_new_sentence: The weather was finally cool enough for a sweater.

sentence: What do you call ten rabbits walking backwards? a receding hare line!
